live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to track multiple hydro related outages in the Winnipeg region. Shaw techs are on standby to assist with restoring our services when Manitoba Hydro completes their repairs.
We await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
35411.title: Mar 26 – Winnipeg  | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Shaw Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to the area and our equipment.
Manitoba Hydro is on site making repairs. Once Hydro repairs have been completed, we expect Shaw services to come back online. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35431.summary: Some customers in the King Edward and Kensington areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35431.title: Mar 26 - Winnipeg (King Edward & Kensington) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
